## ðŸ”’ Paid Article (Sept. 12, 2025): MLM and Web3: Two Sides of the Same Pyramid

Both multi-level marketing (MLM) and Web3 projects sell the same dream: financial freedom, lifestyle independence, and passive income. I experienced the hype firsthand in 2023â€“2024 when I briefly joined World Financial Group (WFG). What I saw there helped me recognize the same structural flaws playing out across Web3. The names and technology change. The math doesnâ€™t.

tags: ðŸ”’ Paid Article (Sept. 12, 2025): MLM and Web3: Two Sides of the Same Pyramid

Both multi-level marketing (MLM) and Web3 projects sell the same dream: financial freedom, lifestyle independence, and passive income. I experienced the hype firsthand in 2023â€“2024 when I briefly joined World Financial Group (WFG). What I saw there helped me recognize the same structural flaws playing out across Web3. The names and technology change. The math doesnâ€™t.
